name: STAYING IN THE WORLD'S WORST AIRPORT HOTEL! 5 Cities Travel Challenge
description:
I ended up in the world's worst airport hotel - the JFK Inn at New York JFK Airport, as part of my latest travel challenge - to fly to as many cities as possible in 24 hours!  I took the British Airways Airbus A380, Jetblue Embraer E190, United Airbus A320, Southwest Boeing 737 and British Airways 747 to visit Boston, Washington DC, Chicago, St Louis and New York in one crazy day!

Please subscribe for more travel vlogs like this!

ZENDURE A8PD BATTERY: https://amzn.to/2L8kIya
FOLLOW US ON FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/inflightvideo

FLIGHTS FEATURED
British Airways Airbus A380 - London to Boston
JetBlue Embraer E190 - Boston to Washington DC
United Airbus A320 - Washington DC to Chicago
Southwest Boeing 737-700 - Chicago to St Louis
Southwest Boeing 737-700 - St Louis to New York
British Airways Boeing 747-400 - New York to London
